clues.text: (Sarah of the Clue Crew at the Széchenyi Chain Bridge in Budapest, Hungary.) The Széchenyi Chain Bridge was the first to permanently span this river and connect the two old cities that form Hungary's capital. At the time, there was debate over Budapest versus Pestbuda
Fanny, who visits Mansfield Park, & hunky Edmund, whom she meets there

Marie's monthly nut for her condo naturally includes HOA dues, HOA short for this
